verses.verse: Now when these<WH428> things were done,<WH3615> the princes<WH8269> came<WH5066> to me, saying,<WH559> The people<WH5971> of Israel,<WH3478> and the priests,<WH3548> and the Levites,<WH3881> have not separated<WH914> themselves from the people<WH5971> of the lands,<WH776> doing according to their abominations,<WH8441> even of the Canaanites,<WH3669> the Hittites,<WH2850> the Perizzites,<WH6522> the Jebusites,<WH2983> the Ammonites,<WH5984> the Moabites,<WH4124> the Egyptians,<WH4713> and the Amorites.<WH567>

For they have taken<WH5375> of their daughters<WH1323> for themselves,<WH1992> and for their sons:<WH1121> so that the holy<WH6944> seed<WH2233> have mingled<WH6148> themselves with the people<WH5971> of those lands:<WH776> yes, the hand<WH3027> of the princes<WH8269> and rulers<WH5461> has been<WH1961> chief<WH7223> in this<WH2088> trespass.<WH4604>

And when I heard<WH8085> this<WH2088> thing,<WH1697> I rent<WH7167> my garment<WH899> and my mantle,<WH4598> and plucked<WH4803> off the hair<WH8181> of my head<WH7218> and of my beard,<WH2206> and sat<WH3427> down astonished.<WH8074>

Then were assembled<WH622> to me every<WH3605> one that trembled<WH2730> at the words<WH1697> of the God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> because<WH5921> of the transgression<WH4604> of those that had been carried<WH1473> away;<WH1473> and I sat<WH3427> astonished<WH8074> until<WH5704> the evening<WH6153> sacrifice.<WH4503>

And at the evening<WH6153> sacrifice<WH4503> I arose<WH6965> up from my heaviness;<WH8589> and having rent<WH7167> my garment<WH899> and my mantle,<WH4598> I fell<WH3766> on my knees,<WH1290> and spread<WH6566> out my hands<WH3709> to the LORD<WH3068> my God,<WH430>

And said,<WH559> O my God,<WH430> I am ashamed<WH954> and blush<WH3637> to lift<WH7311> up my face<WH6440> to you, my God:<WH430> for our iniquities<WH5771> are increased<WH7235> over<WH4605> our head,<WH7218> and our trespass<WH819> is grown<WH1431> up to the heavens.<WH8064>

Since the days<WH3117> of our fathers<WH1> have we been in a great<WH1419> trespass<WH819> to this<WH2088> day;<WH3117> and for our iniquities<WH5771> have we, our kings,<WH4428> and our priests,<WH3548> been delivered<WH5414> into the hand<WH3027> of the kings<WH4428> of the lands,<WH776> to the sword,<WH2719> to captivity,<WH7628> and to a spoil,<WH961> and to confusion<WH1322> of face,<WH6440> as it is this<WH2088> day.<WH3117>

And now<WH6258> for a little<WH4592> space<WH7281> grace<WH8467> has been showed from the LORD<WH3068> our God,<WH430> to leave<WH7604> us a remnant to escape,<WH6413> and to give<WH5414> us a nail<WH3489> in his holy<WH6944> place,<WH4725> that our God<WH430> may lighten<WH215> our eyes,<WH5869> and give<WH5414> us a little<WH4592> reviving<WH4241> in our bondage.<WH5659>

For we were slaves;<WH5650> yet our God<WH430> has not forsaken<WH5800> us in our bondage,<WH5659> but has extended<WH5186> mercy<WH2617> to us in the sight<WH6440> of the kings<WH4428> of Persia,<WH6539> to give<WH5414> us a reviving,<WH4241> to set<WH7311> up the house<WH1004> of our God,<WH430> and to repair<WH5975> the desolations<WH2723> thereof, and to give<WH5414> us a wall<WH1447> in Judah<WH3063> and in Jerusalem.<WH3389>
And now,<WH6258> O our God,<WH430> what<WH4100> shall we say<WH559> after<WH310> this?<WH2063> for we have forsaken<WH5800> your commandments,<WH4687>

Which<WH834> you have commanded<WH6680> by your servants<WH5650> the prophets,<WH5030> saying,<WH559> The land,<WH776> to which<WH834> you go<WH935> to possess<WH3423> it, is an unclean<WH5079> land<WH776> with the filthiness<WH5079> of the people<WH5971> of the lands,<WH776> with their abominations,<WH8441> which<WH834> have filled<WH4390> it from one end<WH6310> to another with their uncleanness.<WH2932>

Now<WH6258> therefore give<WH5414> not your daughters<WH1323> to their sons,<WH1121> neither<WH408> take<WH5375> their daughters<WH1323> to your sons,<WH1121> nor<WH3808> seek<WH1875> their peace<WH7965> or their wealth<WH2896> for ever:<WH5769> that you may be strong,<WH2388> and eat<WH398> the good<WH2898> of the land,<WH776> and leave it for an inheritance<WH3423> to your children<WH1121> for ever.<WH5769>

And after<WH310> all<WH3605> that is come<WH935> on us for our evil<WH7451> deeds,<WH4639> and for our great<WH1419> trespass,<WH819> seeing<WH3588> that you our God<WH430> have punished<WH2820> us less<WH4295> than our iniquities<WH5771> deserve, and have given<WH5414> us such deliverance<WH6413> as this;<WH2063>

Should we again<WH7725> break<WH6565> your commandments,<WH4687> and join<WH2859> in affinity<WH2859> with the people<WH5971> of these<WH428> abominations?<WH8441> would not you be angry<WH599> with us till<WH5704> you had consumed<WH3615> us, so that there should be no<WH369> remnant<WH7611> nor escaping?<WH6413>

O LORD<WH3068> God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> you are righteous:<WH6662> for we remain<WH7604> yet escaped,<WH6413> as it is this<WH2063> day:<WH3117> behold,<WH2005> we are before<WH6440> you in our trespasses:<WH819> for we cannot<WH3808> stand<WH5975> before<WH6440> you because<WH5921> of this.<WH2063>
